item.description:
Recent Paintings by Laurel Reilly-Raska

Thanks, it would be great to have some folks drop by the opening. It's my first show since college (many years!) but I'm excited. This would be mainly a viewing event though it takes place in a large cafe with comfortable tables and a sofa. If you would like to come earlier, there is an (unorganized) opportunity to sketch.


The show will be up from April 7 - May 27 and is part of Dedham Open Studios on May 20.
http://www.dedhamopenstudios.org/users/laurelrr

Opening Reception
Saturday, April 7 from 3-5
Paradise Cafe, 569 High Street Dedham, MA 02026
(781) 326-5674

Thank you,
Laurel
item.name: OPENING RECEPTION BY ONE OF OUR ARTISTS, Laurel
